ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Trolls and Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome Cronikx! Ok, here s what I know (and it s not much) 1) Dunno but why would you want to go into Freeport?   Ick! 2) No.  You cannot train at the Troll
ygData.messageBody:
RE: [shadowknight] Trolls and Freeport

Welcome Cronikx!

Ok, here's what I know (and it's not much)

1) Dunno but why would you want to go into Freeport?   Ick!

2) No.  You cannot train at the Troll Sk area in Neriak Foriegn Sector.   Bummer.

3) It raises Indigo Brotherhood faction....not Lodge of the Dead faction.

Hope that helps!

Nagek
TSK
Tallon Zek
"If der a guudie, BASHEM!!!!"

-----Original Message-----
From: (Cronikx) [mailto:vtemplarv@...]
Sent: Friday, March 17, 2000 11:55 AM
To: '(Shadowknight)'
Subject: [shadowknight] Trolls and Freeport


From: "(Cronikx)" <vtemplarv@...>

Hello everyone. I am new here and have some questions for you.
1) Is it possible to not be KoS in Freeport propper as a Troll? By that I
mean with the guards, merchants and other NPCs? I know the Arcane Science
NPCs will always KoS you, but was not sure about the others.

2) Can you train as a Troll SK in Neriak at either the Troll SK in Foriegn
1/4, or at the DE SK guild?  Cronikx's Diety is Innorukk.

3) Will killing slaves in Crushbone increase Dead faction in Neriak?

--
Cronikx
4th Sword of Hate
